'''''You Can Have Those Back!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a [[Primo Geovishap]]'s Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.

==Trivia==
* The Indonesian version of the achievement is probably a reference to a popular phrase in the {{w|Book of Exodus}} 21:23&ndash;27. In Indonesian, it says, "{{id|...&nbsp;nyawa ganti nyawa, <u>mata ganti mata</u>, gigi ganti gigi,&nbsp;....}}"
